page.title: 10TRANSPORT IN HARDWICK
page.content: Only{Hardstoft}and{Glapwell}were reported as being served by{public {transport.}These{bus services}earned comments ranging from "good" to "erratic". For a large number of the population the nearest bus-stop is between two and four miles away. A {school bus service}does operate in the area, the nearest schools being at {Heath}and{Bramley Vale. Taking into account the lack of public transport, it comes as no surprise that almost all the residents own, or have access to, a{car.}This then is the primary mode of transport and is essential for those employed outside the area.
